meanings.definition: The state of being contiguous; proximity.
meanings.sent1: The contiguities of the houses in our neighborhood make it easy to visit our friends.
meanings.sent2: The contiguities of the puzzle pieces helped us complete the picture.
meanings.sent3: The contiguities of the cookies on the plate made them look like a delicious pattern.
meanings.sent4: The contiguities of the stars in the sky formed a beautiful constellation.
meanings.sent5: The contiguities of the books on the shelf made it easy to find the one I wanted.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being contiguous.
meanings.sent1: I appreciate the contiguities of the colors in your painting.
meanings.sent2: The contiguities of the buildings in the city create a unique skyline.
meanings.sent3: The contiguities of the flavors in the dish made it a culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The contiguities of the music notes in the song flowed seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The contiguities of the flowers in the garden added to its beauty.

meanings.definition: The relationship between two adjacent elements or units in a sequence.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the contiguities between the numbers is crucial in solving the math problem.
meanings.sent2: The contiguities between the paragraphs help maintain the flow of the story.
meanings.sent3: The contiguities between the dance moves made the performance entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The contiguities between the scenes in the movie kept the audience engaged.
meanings.sent5: The contiguities between the ingredients in the recipe ensure a delicious outcome.
